name: Olpi
description:
Helo!

I decide to share with you this game that I've start dev almost 3 years ago.

The game is an Endless Shooter 2D with Upgrades. You can notice that my personal instagram and the pixel artist Matheus  its on screen couse its the test version 13.0 of the project. 

It was made using Construc 2.

I lost the project archive, so I cant keep going on this project, i had so many ideas to insert, already had made a translation but once i lost the main project the only way to continue was start from begin. 

It still having some placeholders and minors bugs, but its totaly playable.

I hope that you guys enjoy, having some fun and chalenging yourself to get 1000 soulpoints with all upgrades.

GG

Renato Trindade.
